comments.message: It was an awesome event. Looking forward to more such events. Thanks Raghu and Manju for making it possible.

Hey Akbar,

comments.author: Manjukiran
comments.message: Akbar, the event was awesome and professionally organized.  Audience were great.  I enjoyed every bit of it.  Looking forward for more such events.

comments.author: Sabarinathan
comments.message:
First Hearty Congrats and Thanks to Akbar, who pulled out Adobe @ Chennai.

This was a Great Event.. Nicely Organized.

When I start hearing the Speech, I really wonder the Features of Cold Fusion 8 and 9, Flash Builder 4 and Flash Catalyst. 

Looking for more events like this. 

Akbar, Please inform me if any other events on RIA.

Regards,
Sabari
